text:
REPAIR CATALOG


R-2195

 town \& country

TRACTORS MODEL 107

PRODUCT NO.

SERIAL NO.


53121 MANUAL START 1601 AND AFTER \\ 53126 ELECTRIC START 1601 AND AFTER

Page 5:
Add after reference no. 4, 500678...1 set brake pads.
Change reference no. 14 from 155010 to 350978.
Change reference no. 63 from 155011 to 350977.
Page 9:
Change reference no. 1 from 119215 to 158527.
Change reference no. 32 from 331959 to 332506.
Ignore all references to decals and use the following: 20-0000442 R.H. "Town \& Country" (R.H. side of hood). 20-0000443 L.H. "Town \& Country" (L.H. side of hood). 20-0000445 "107" (each side of grill housing). 20-0000451 "White" (front grill panel dash panel overlay). 20-0000444 "Town \& Country" (back of seat). 10A29241 "Electric Start" (dash pane1).

Page 14:
Add: 350572 ...Wire, solenoid to ammeter.

MR. DEALER:
WHEN ORDERING REPLACEMENT PARTS FROM THIS CATALOG, BE SURE TO ADD THE PREFIX LETTERS JX TO THE PART NUMBER. THIS WILL HELP TO IDENTIFY THE PRODUCT FOR WHICH THE PART IS INTENDED.

EXAMPLE:

PARTS CATALOG NOã€‚126275
ORDER JX126275
